review: For the most part it did but to really enjoy all the fire stick has to offer you have to be a prime member. I love it just wish it had more free options if you aren't a prime member. Over all. Works great and I really like it
author: Ash

review: Easy to use and lots of options.
author: Amazon Customer

review: its ok but not a large selection of anything like you are meant to believe
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works well, no issues so far
author: Sarah

review: I am satisfied with my fire stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazon being sneaky and not putting the correct software or somewhat blocking other apps so they jump skip so you'll go ahead and buy Amazon stuff instead. I'm returning mine to best buy today to get a Roku
author: Cruizeguru

review: love my new fire stick still more to learn about it
author: Flutterby

review: I have used this without any problems. Love it. Stopped my premium cable subscription. Every day the Fire Stick has something new to offer. I got another FS for my bedroom.
author: cmeplay

review: It was too slow. The picture got blurry and would freeze and then go really fast. I returned it. We migh try the fire TV.
author: Katie Rich
